method: 1. Preheat your oven to the temperature specified on the pizza dough package.
2. Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface to your desired thickness.
3. Transfer the rolled-out dough onto a greased pizza stone or baking sheet.
4. Spread the tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a small border for the crust.
5. Sprinkle the shredded mozzarella cheese over the tomato sauce.
6. Top the pizza with the sliced mushrooms, black olives, diced bell peppers, and diced onions.
7. Sprinkle the dried oregano, dried basil, salt, and black pepper over the toppings.
8. Bake in the preheated oven for the time specified on the pizza dough package or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is bubbly and melted.
9. Remove from the oven, let it cool for a few minutes, slice, and enjoy your Couch Potato Pizza!
